component_summary.name: Pagination
component_summary.description: Accessible pagination primitives (nav, ul, li, link, previous/next buttons, ellipsis) that compose existing Button variants for consistent styling. Intended for simple page navigation UI.

components.name: Pagination
components.description: Wrapper nav element with role=navigation and aria-label for pagination.

components.name: PaginationContent
components.description: Container UL for pagination items, styled as a horizontal list.

components.name: PaginationItem
components.description: List item wrapper for each pagination control.

components.name: PaginationLink
components.description: Anchor styled as a button using buttonVariants; supports isActive to toggle outline/ghost styling and accepts size prop.

components.name: PaginationPrevious / PaginationNext
components.description: Convenience components combining PaginationLink with Chevron icons and accessible labels.

components.name: PaginationEllipsis
components.description: Presentation-only ellipsis indicator (MoreHorizontal icon) used when pages are collapsed.

notes: Presentation-only; delegates styling to buttonVariants and uses cn utility for class composition.
Accessible attributes applied (aria-current for active page, aria-hidden for ellipsis).
Low duplication risk; consistent pattern with other UI primitives.
